name: Dynamax Drampa during Max Monday
title: Dynamax Drampa during Max Monday
description: These Dynamax Pokémon may appear in Max Battles throughout Tales of Transformation. They will also take over Power Spots for an hour each week on Mondays from 6:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m. local time! On January 5, 2026 , the featured Dynamax Pokémon is Drampa .

name: GO Pass: December
title: GO Pass: December
description: Palkia and the Timed Incubator return for GO Pass: December! From Tuesday, December 2, 2025, at 10:00 a.m. to Tuesday, January 6, 2026, at 10:00 a.m. local time, the GO Pass and GO Pass Deluxe for December will be available in Pokémon GO!

name: Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Tainan 2026
title: Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Tainan 2026
description: Location: Tainan Metropolitan Park, Tainan, Taiwan Dates: February 20–22, 2026 Time: 9:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m. GMT+8 Ticket Price: NT $733 (Early Bird, regular $818) – Early Bird Discount available through December 31 Experience an exclusive in-person Pokémon GO event in Tainan! Inspired by a place where dreams and adventures begin, Pokémon GO Tour is bringing the Kalos region to life in Tainan. Embark on a journey of beauty and bonds as you collect Pokémon, discover legendary stories, and experience the community of Pokémon GO in-person. All event gameplay is exclusive to ticket holders. You will only be able to experience the event gameplay within Tainan Metropolitan Park during the date and time noted on your event ticket. Other Event Locations: Buy tickets: Pokémon GO Tour Website

name: Mega Night at Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Tainan 2026
title: Mega Night at Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Tainan 2026
description: Location: Tainan Metropolitan Park, Tainan, Taiwan Dates: February 20, 21, 22, 2026 Time: 5:00 p.m. – 7:00 p.m. GMT+8 Ticket Price: NT$529.00 An all-new nighttime celebration is coming to Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos! Attendees may purchase this ticket as an addition to their primary Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos – Tainan ticket. Add-on tickets are NT$529.00 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency, plus any applicable taxes and fees) and are available for purchase on the Pokémon GO Tour website . Event gameplay will be available only at the date, time, and location specified on your ticket. Note: Tickets to this event are nonrefundable (subject to applicable law and the exceptions set forth in the Terms of Service). Tickets are first come, first served and are available for purchase while supplies last. It’s a night of fun, friends, and Pokémon adventures! For the first time ever, we’re excited to offer a new nighttime event experience at Pokémon GO Tour, available to purchase as an add-on to your main event ticket. Mega Night is a ticketed evening event, taking place after the main daytime Pokémon GO Tour event. Look forward to unique gameplay, special entertainment and more during this “after hours” extravaganza! All event gameplay is exclusive to Mega Night ticket holders. Please note: You will only be able to experience the event gameplay within Tainan Metropolitan Park during the date and time noted on your add-on ticket.

name: Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Los Angeles 2026
title: Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Los Angeles 2026
description: Location: Rose Bowl Stadium, Los Angeles, United States Dates: February 20–22, 2026 Time: 9:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m. PST Ticket Price: US $30.00 (Early Bird $25.00 through December 31) – Early Bird Discount available through December 31 Experience an exclusive in-person Pokémon GO event in Los Angeles! Inspired by a place where dreams and adventures begin, Pokémon GO Tour is bringing the Kalos region to life in Los Angeles. Embark on a journey of beauty and bonds as you collect Pokémon, discover legendary stories, and experience the community of Pokémon GO in-person. All event gameplay is exclusive to ticket holders. You will only be able to experience the event gameplay within Rose Bowl Stadium during the date and time noted on your event ticket. Other Event Locations: Buy tickets: Pokémon GO Tour Website Price: Note: Tickets include one day of event gameplay. Attendees may purchase add-ons that extend citywide gameplay for an additional day.

name: Mega Night at Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Los Angeles 2026
title: Mega Night at Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Los Angeles 2026
description: Location: Rose Bowl Stadium and Brookside Golf Course, Los Angeles, United States Dates: February 20, 21, 22, 2026 Time: 6:00 p.m. – 8:00 p.m. PST Ticket Price: US $20.00 An all-new nighttime celebration is coming to Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos! Attendees may purchase this ticket as an addition to their primary Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos – Los Angeles ticket. Add-on tickets are US$20.00 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency, plus any applicable taxes and fees) and are available for purchase on the Pokémon GO Tour website . Event gameplay will be available only at the date, time, and location specified on your ticket. Note: Tickets to this event are nonrefundable (subject to applicable law and the exceptions set forth in the Terms of Service). Tickets are first come, first served and are available for purchase while supplies last. It’s a night of fun, friends, and Pokémon adventures! For the first time ever, we’re excited to offer a new nighttime event experience at Pokémon GO Tour, available to purchase as an add-on to your main event ticket. Mega Night is a ticketed evening event, taking place after the main daytime Pokémon GO Tour event. Look forward to unique gameplay, special entertainment and more during this “after hours” extravaganza! All event gameplay is exclusive to Mega Night ticket holders. Please note: You will only be able to experience the event gameplay within Rose Bowl Stadium and Brookside Golf Course during the date and time noted on your add-on ticket.

name: Great League and Love Cup: Great League Edition | Precious Paths
title: Great League and Love Cup: Great League Edition | Precious Paths
description: The Great League and Love Cup: Great League Edition will run from February 17, 2026, at 1:00 p.m. to February 24, 2026, at 1:00 p.m. PT.

name: Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Global 2026
title: Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Global 2026
description: Other Event Locations: Buy tickets: Pokémon GO Web Store Join millions of Trainers across the globe for Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos – Global! Take part in this worldwide event inspired by the Kalos region, first featured in Pokémon X and Pokémon Y on the Nintendo 3DS. Get ready to experience new gameplay inspired by the stories and characters of Pokémon X and Pokémon Y. From longtime Kalos fans to new Trainers picking up Pokémon GO for the first time, anyone can take part in this exciting two-day event at no cost! Looking to enhance your GO Tour adventure with exclusive Special Research, additional bonuses, and an increased chance of encountering Shiny Pokémon? Purchase a global event ticket from the Pokémon GO Web Store !

name: Masterwork Research: A Precious Catch
title: Masterwork Research: A Precious Catch
description: The times above are when the ticket can be purchased and the Masterwork Research can be obtained. Masterwork Research does not expire, you can complete it at your own pace. For US$7.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency), Trainers will receive a Special Research granting a Master Ball as one of the rewards. Receiving a rare and powerful Master Ball is a special occasion—think wisely about how you’ll use it, and keep a lookout for future opportunities in Pokémon GO to acquire more! Tickets will be available for purchase in the in-game shop from Tuesday, December 2, 2025, at 10:00 a.m. to Tuesday, March 3, 2026, at 9:59 a.m. local time. Tickets cannot be purchased with PokéCoins. Tickets to this event are nonrefundable (subject to applicable law and the exceptions set forth in the Terms of Service).

name: Max Battle Day
title: Max Battle Day
description: The Max Battle Day event will take place on February 15, 2026 from 2 pm to 5 pm. Stay tuned for more details.

name: Great League and Love Cup: Great League Edition | Precious Paths
title: Great League and Love Cup: Great League Edition | Precious Paths
description: The Great League and Love Cup: Great League Edition will run from February 17, 2026, at 1:00 p.m. to February 24, 2026, at 1:00 p.m. PT.

name: Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Tainan 2026
title: Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Tainan 2026
description: Location: Tainan Metropolitan Park, Tainan, Taiwan Dates: February 20–22, 2026 Time: 9:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m. GMT+8 Ticket Price: NT $733 (Early Bird, regular $818) – Early Bird Discount available through December 31 Experience an exclusive in-person Pokémon GO event in Tainan! Inspired by a place where dreams and adventures begin, Pokémon GO Tour is bringing the Kalos region to life in Tainan. Embark on a journey of beauty and bonds as you collect Pokémon, discover legendary stories, and experience the community of Pokémon GO in-person. All event gameplay is exclusive to ticket holders. You will only be able to experience the event gameplay within Tainan Metropolitan Park during the date and time noted on your event ticket. Other Event Locations: Buy tickets: Pokémon GO Tour Website

name: Mega Night at Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Tainan 2026
title: Mega Night at Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Tainan 2026
description: Location: Tainan Metropolitan Park, Tainan, Taiwan Dates: February 20, 21, 22, 2026 Time: 5:00 p.m. – 7:00 p.m. GMT+8 Ticket Price: NT$529.00 An all-new nighttime celebration is coming to Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos! Attendees may purchase this ticket as an addition to their primary Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos – Tainan ticket. Add-on tickets are NT$529.00 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency, plus any applicable taxes and fees) and are available for purchase on the Pokémon GO Tour website . Event gameplay will be available only at the date, time, and location specified on your ticket. Note: Tickets to this event are nonrefundable (subject to applicable law and the exceptions set forth in the Terms of Service). Tickets are first come, first served and are available for purchase while supplies last. It’s a night of fun, friends, and Pokémon adventures! For the first time ever, we’re excited to offer a new nighttime event experience at Pokémon GO Tour, available to purchase as an add-on to your main event ticket. Mega Night is a ticketed evening event, taking place after the main daytime Pokémon GO Tour event. Look forward to unique gameplay, special entertainment and more during this “after hours” extravaganza! All event gameplay is exclusive to Mega Night ticket holders. Please note: You will only be able to experience the event gameplay within Tainan Metropolitan Park during the date and time noted on your add-on ticket.

name: Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Los Angeles 2026
title: Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Los Angeles 2026
description: Location: Rose Bowl Stadium, Los Angeles, United States Dates: February 20–22, 2026 Time: 9:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m. PST Ticket Price: US $30.00 (Early Bird $25.00 through December 31) – Early Bird Discount available through December 31 Experience an exclusive in-person Pokémon GO event in Los Angeles! Inspired by a place where dreams and adventures begin, Pokémon GO Tour is bringing the Kalos region to life in Los Angeles. Embark on a journey of beauty and bonds as you collect Pokémon, discover legendary stories, and experience the community of Pokémon GO in-person. All event gameplay is exclusive to ticket holders. You will only be able to experience the event gameplay within Rose Bowl Stadium during the date and time noted on your event ticket. Other Event Locations: Buy tickets: Pokémon GO Tour Website Price: Note: Tickets include one day of event gameplay. Attendees may purchase add-ons that extend citywide gameplay for an additional day.

name: Mega Night at Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Los Angeles 2026
title: Mega Night at Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Los Angeles 2026
description: Location: Rose Bowl Stadium and Brookside Golf Course, Los Angeles, United States Dates: February 20, 21, 22, 2026 Time: 6:00 p.m. – 8:00 p.m. PST Ticket Price: US $20.00 An all-new nighttime celebration is coming to Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos! Tickets are first come, first served and are available for purchase while supplies last. It’s a night of fun, friends, and Pokémon adventures! For the first time ever, we’re excited to offer a new nighttime event experience at Pokémon GO Tour, available to purchase as an add-on to your main event ticket. Mega Night is a ticketed evening event, taking place after the main daytime Pokémon GO Tour event. Look forward to unique gameplay, special entertainment and more during this “after hours” extravaganza! All event gameplay is exclusive to Mega Night ticket holders. name: Great League, Ultra League, and Master League: Mega Edition | Precious Paths
title: Great League, Ultra League, and Master League: Mega Edition | Precious Paths
description: The Great League, Ultra League, and Master League: Mega Edition will run from February 24, 2026, at 1:00 p.m. to March 3, 2026, at 1:00 p.m. PT. Trainers will also receive 4× Stardust from win rewards (this does not include end-of-set rewards).

name: Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Global 2026
title: Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Global 2026
description: Other Event Locations: Buy tickets: Pokémon GO Web Store Join millions of Trainers across the globe for Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos – Global! Take part in this worldwide event inspired by the Kalos region, first featured in Pokémon X and Pokémon Y on the Nintendo 3DS. Get ready to experience new gameplay inspired by the stories and characters of Pokémon X and Pokémon Y. From longtime Kalos fans to new Trainers picking up Pokémon GO for the first time, anyone can take part in this exciting two-day event at no cost! Looking to enhance your GO Tour adventure with exclusive Special Research, additional bonuses, and an increased chance of encountering Shiny Pokémon? Purchase a global event ticket from the Pokémon GO Web Store !
